hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Dataset_Name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
If this value is left blank the first node of each concept path will be used as the study name ( The dataset ref ).
Example 1: Dataset_Name: Concept Path: 
ode 1
ode 2
ode 3\ Study Name: node 1
Example 2: Dataset_Name: Nhanes Concept Path: 
ode 1
ode 2
ode 3\ Study Name: Nhanes

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: Clear_Dictionary_Database
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Backup of the current database will be available in the "$DOCKER_CONFIG_DIR/dictionary/csv/backup/"

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cp /usr/local/docker-config/dictionary/dictionary.env .env
docker stop dictionaryetl || true docker rm dictionaryetl || true docker run -d \ --name dictionaryetl \ --env-file .env \ -p 8086:8086 \ -v $DOCKER_CONFIG_DIR/hpds/:/opt/local/hpds/ \ --network dictionary \ --network picsure \ hms-dbmi/dictionary-etl:latest
echo "Waiting for DictionaryEtlApplication to start..." MAX_ATTEMPTS=6 SLEEP_INTERVAL=5 ATTEMPT=1 while ! docker logs dictionaryetl 2>&1 | grep -q "Started DictionaryEtlApplication"; do if [ "$ATTEMPT" -ge "$MAX_ATTEMPTS" ]; then echo "DictionaryEtlApplication failed to start within $((MAX_ATTEMPTS * SLEEP_INTERVAL)) seconds." docker logs dictionaryetl docker stop dictionaryetl docker rm dictionaryetl exit 1 fi echo "Attempt $ATTEMPT: Application not started yet. Retrying in $SLEEP_INTERVAL seconds..." sleep $SLEEP_INTERVAL ATTEMPT=$((ATTEMPT + 1)) done echo "DictionaryEtlApplication has started!"
#curl -s "http://dictionaryetl:8086/load/initialize?datasetName=$Dataset_Name&includeDefaultFacets=true&clearDatabase=$Clear_Dictionary_Database" curl -v -s -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -d '{ "datasetName": "'"$Dataset_Name"'", "includeDefaultFacets": 'true', "clearDatabase": "'"$Clear_Dictionary_Database"'" }' \ http://dictionaryetl:8086/load/initialize
docker stop dictionaryetl docker rm dictionaryetl
